title: 5.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Design and code an About my friend app. The app should get the following inputfrom the user.
◼ Friend’s name
◼ His/her hobby
◼ Favorite place
◼ Favorite food
Display paragraph text about your friend using the inputs

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
